document_data.name: Hobart Bracegirdle
document_data.mainbody: '''Hobart Bracegirdle''' was the leader of the [[Kneebreakers]] in [[Damara]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hobart wandered with his companions in search of wrongs needing righting.
document_data.Personality: Hobart was very able to inspire his fellows and was a good leader. He wanted to become a famous hero like [[Kane]] or [[Olwen Forest-Friend]].
